name: A journey to hidden world
description:
You have Accidentally went to an hidden world but you still have the vision to see the dark world . Will you ever get back to your home.

Devlog  - (To be uploaded)

Controls - 

W - jump

A/D - movement

Controls (ghost mode) -

W/A/S/D - movement

After rebirth your speed and jump will change, Ghost mode can be activated by touching spikes.

I want to add more but I ran out of time and also felt ill :(
